DOC.brief_summary: A single visit & single arm study 80 subject diabetes determine short educational experience new blood glucose meter feature improve ability subject good classify glucose result acceptable glucose range .
DOC.brief_title: Diabetic Mellitus Patients Glucose Range Awareness After Experiencing New Blood Glucose Meter Feature
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed Type 1 diabetes Mellitus ( T1DM ) Type 2 diabetes Mellitus ( T2DM ) ≥ 3 month Currently perform self monitor blood glucose ( SMBG ) home Aged ≥16 year Previous use blood glucose meter colour range indicator feature evaluate study .
